edu.ncsu.dre.engine
Interface ResearchScheduler

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
StandAloneScheduler
public interface ResearchScheduler
extends java.io.Serializable

ResearchScheduler is the general term for all DRE components that can be used to schedule information collection over all the artifact subsets. The subsets of artifacts are provided to this interface and its derivatives by a Segregator.

Most applications will not need to deal with this abstract ResearchScheduler interface. DRE Developers who need to introduce new types of Schedulers however, will need to implement this interface.

Author:
Santthosh Babu Selvadurai
